system.description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 7th-level creature, 1d3 6th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind. When you summon an air, chaotic, earth, evil, fire, good, lawful, or water creature, the spell has that descriptor.
system.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
